welcome_message_body: Welcome to Villefranche-de-Rouergue, a charming town known for its medieval architecture, rich history, and vibrant culture. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Marcillac Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Marcillac Airport is reserved for VIP and private charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Sequestre Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal dedicated to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Laberandie Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Laberandie Airport, primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
